_phrases.cloud_saving:
Syncing...
Your progress is being synced to the cloud to enable you to resume your learning later.
_phrases.cloud_success:
Sync successful
Your progress has been saved to the cloud. You can safely close this window.

Transfer progress to app
_phrases.cloud_failed:
Sync failed
Your progress is being saved locally only. You can continue to learn. To sync your progress, simply reconnect to the internet before closing this window.
_phrases.enter_email:
Save your progress, earn rewards...

Please enter your email address in the box below. You will receive an email linking to your unique profile so you can save your progress, earn rewards and resume your learning on any device.
_phrases.nav_help:
Quick Start
Menu
Navigate between modules (including main menu) and locate additional resources connected to each module.
View module progress. Click for in module navigation.
Cloud syncronisation status for resuming progress on any device.
_phrases.pathfinder-complete:
Congratulations!

Pathfinder
✔

You have successfully earned your Pathfinder badge. You now understand the basics of open data.

Keep collecting to get the full set of badges.

Want to learn in more depth? Find out more and get hands-on on our Open Data in a Day course.
_phrases.adventurer-complete:
Congratulations

Adventurer
✔

You have successfully earned your Adventurer badge. You now recognise the underlying principles that make open data successful.

Keep collecting to get the full set of badges.

Want to learn in more depth? Learn with others and discover new tools on our Open Data in a Day course.
_phrases.technician-complete:
Congratulations

Technician
✔

You have successfully earned your Technician badge.You now possess the essential knowledge to start using and publishing data.

Keep collecting to get the full set of badges.

Want to put your knowledge into practice? Get hands on with our Open Data in Practice and Open Data Science courses.
_phrases.planner-complete:
Congratulations

Planner
✔

You have successfully earned your Planner badge. You now have the foundational knowledge to plan an open data initiative.

Keep collecting to get the full set of badges.

Want to start planning? Kickstart your journey with our Open Data in Practice or our Business Innovation Workshop.
